DOC.brief_summary: Pilot study assess feasibility initial efficacy therapist-as-consultant , game-based CI therapy . Pre/post study design . Participant receive target 30 hour game-based motor intervention , 100 hour constraint less affected upper extremity , 5 hour therapist consultation ( include completion behavioral contract first study visit ) . Duration intervention 10 consecutive weekday , pre-treatment post-treatment testing perform within 1 week prior 1 week post-intervention independent tester .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Assess Feasibility Initial Efficacy Therapist-as-consultant , Game-based CI Therapy
DOC.criteria: Provide sign date informed consent form Willing comply study procedure available duration study Male female age > 17 Preserved ability comprehend English participate basic element therapy Communitydwelling Experienced mild moderate hemiparesis least six month prior Can independently operate game system ( severe cognitive impairment usually achieve ) Corrected vision least 20/70 assessed ability identify game object monitor 5 foot away concurrent participation experimental upper extremity trial concurrent participation outpatient rehabilitation upper extremity Botox within last 3 month ( confound ) nearnormal motor function ( 9hole Peg Test score 10th percentile normative sample ) minimal nonuse ( Motor Activity Log baseline > 2.5 , Accelerometry > 60 % ) major medical issue would interfere study treatment make intensive rehabilitation difficult tolerate
